lead_paragraph: Newcastle United are on the verge of relegation from the Premier League after failing to do what most teams in the Premier League have found easy this season -- win at Villa Park.

headline.print_headline: Newcastle on Brink After Failing to Beat Villa
headline.main: Newcastle on Brink After Failing to Beat Villa

snippet: Newcastle United are on the verge of relegation from the Premier League after failing to do what most teams in the Premier League have found easy this season -- win at Villa Park....
